  • org.apache.storm.cassandraにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    OutputCollector
    This output collector exposes the API for emitting tuples from an IRichBolt.
    WorkerTopologyContext 
  • org.apache.storm.cassandra.boltにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IBolt
    An IBolt represents a component that takes tuples as input and produces tuples as output.
    OutputCollector
    This output collector exposes the API for emitting tuples from an IRichBolt.
    TopologyContext
    A TopologyContext is given to bolts and spouts in their prepare() and open() methods, respectively.
  • org.apache.storm.cassandra.executorにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    OutputCollector
    This output collector exposes the API for emitting tuples from an IRichBolt.
  • org.apache.storm.cassandra.executor.implにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明

    This output collector exposes the API for emitting tuples from an IRichBolt.
  • org.apache.storm.cassandra.trident.stateにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IMetricsContext 
  • org.apache.storm.clojureにより使用されるorg.apache.storm.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    IBolt
    An IBolt represents a component that takes tuples as input and produces tuples as output.
    OutputCollector
    This output collector exposes the API for emitting tuples from an IRichBolt.
    ShellBolt
    A bolt that shells out to another process to process tuples.
    TopologyContext
    A TopologyContext is given to bolts and spouts in their prepare() and open() methods, respectively.
